decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly dealing damage to the opponent through a combination of aggressive creatures and burn spells. Guttersnipe and Kessig Flamebreather help trigger extra damage with spells like Fiery Temper, Fireblast, and Lava Dart. Grab the Prize and Highway Robbery provide some card advantage while Sneaky Snacker and Voldaren Epicure offer additional creature threats. Lightning Bolt serves as additional removal and direct damage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast damage output and efficient spell usage.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on utilizing a combination of artifacts and sacrifice effects to generate value and control the battlefield. The key strategy is to control the opponent's resources while building up your own board presence, utilizing cards like Cleansing Wildfire and Drossforge Bridge to disrupt the opponent's mana base and draw cards. With a mix of removal spells and creature threats, this deck aims to apply constant pressure on the opponent and outvalue them in the mid to late game.

This Pauper 1 vs 1 Control deck focuses on utilizing Ephemerate to repeatedly generate value from creature ETB effects like Mulldrifter and Archaeomancer. The deck includes cards like Snap and Prohibit to control the board, while also running efficient cantrips like Preordain and Sunscape Familiar to ensure consistent card advantage. The deck also includes key pieces like Meeting of Minds and Lórien Revealed to further generate card advantage and outvalue the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to control the game through efficient removal, counterspells, and repeatable value generation.

This deck focuses on utilizing artifact creatures and cheap spells to flood the board quickly and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By generating value from artifacts and utilizing efficient removal spells, the deck aims to establish board control early and maintain pressure throughout the game. The synergy between artifact creatures, draw spells, and removal creates a fast-paced and adaptable playstyle that can quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. It combines the affinity mechanic with aggressive tactics to create a powerful and dynamic deck.

This deck focuses on using low-cost creatures like Slippery Bogle and Gladecover Scout to quickly apply powerful aura enchantments like Ancestral Mask and Armadillo Cloak, turning them into formidable threats. The deck also includes mana acceleration with cards like Utopia Sprawl and Abundant Growth to help cast these auras quickly. Malevolent Rumble provides removal for opposing creatures, while Ethereal Armor boosts the power of the enchanted creatures. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast, aggressive strategy that can quickly end the game.

The main focus of the deck is to control the game by countering opponent's spells and removing threats with cards like Snuff Out and Cast Down. Utilizing Faerie creatures like Spellstutter Sprite and Ninja of the Deep Hours to maintain board presence and card advantage. Lórien Revealed provides card draw and Contaminated Aquifer helps fix mana. Bojuka Bog is used for graveyard hate and Thorn of the Black Rose generates card advantage. The deck aims to stay ahead in card advantage and disrupt opponent's game plan to secure victory.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using Ephemerate to protect key creatures and disrupt opponents' strategies. It utilizes cards like Cleansing Wildfire and Counterspell to manage opponents' resources while generating card advantage with Lórien Revealed and Mulldrifter. The deck also includes removal spells like Skred and Torch the Tower to deal with threats. Archaeomancer helps to recur important spells, while Augur of Bolas and Preordain provide card selection. The deck aims to outvalue opponents with its efficient control elements and resilient threats.

The main focus of this deck is to stall the game with fog effects and gain life until the player is able to combo off with Fanatical Offering and Eviscerator's Insight, potentially creating an overwhelming advantage. The deck also includes mana ramp and card draw to help find the combo pieces quickly. Control elements like Duress and Nihil Spellbomb help disrupt the opponent's strategy while Crypt Rats provide a board wipe option. Overall, the deck aims to win by overwhelming the opponent with card advantage and a powerful combo finish.

The main focus of this deck is to aggressively control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy while quickly deploying powerful threats. By utilizing cheap spells like Force Spike and Counterspell to protect your creatures like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent, you can efficiently apply pressure and maintain tempo. The deck also includes card draw and graveyard interaction to maintain resources and continue the assault. With a mix of disruption, card advantage, and efficient threats, this Mono Blue Aggro deck aims to overwhelm opponents and secure victory.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with Utopia Sprawl, Arbor Elf, and Wild Growth to cast large creatures like Nyxborn Hydra and Avenging Hunter. Malevolent Rumble and Ram Through help clear the way for your creatures to deal damage, while Jewel Thief and Eldrazi Repurposer allow for additional card draw and removal. Writhing Chrysalis can create tokens for extra aggression, and Bannerhide Krushok provides trample to push through opponent's defenses. Boarding Party offers additional threats to overwhelm the opponent. This deck aims to attack early and often to pressure the opponent into a quick defeat.

This Jund Aggro deck focuses on recurring artifacts and sacrificing them for value, while also having removal spells to control the board. By utilizing cards like Refurbished Familiar and Fanatical Offering, the deck can generate card advantage and pressure the opponent. With a mix of creatures, artifacts, and removal spells, this deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also presenting a threatening board presence. Twisted Landscape and Drossforge Bridge provide additional mana fixing and ramp, allowing for explosive plays and versatility in the early game.

The primary focus of this deck is to quickly establish board control and disrupt the opponent's game plan through counterspells and tempo plays. The deck is designed to apply pressure early with efficient creatures like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent, while also maintaining card advantage and filtering through the deck with spells like Brainstorm and Ponder. By controlling the board and leveraging card advantage, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victories through a combination of tempo and efficient threats.

This deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with a swarm of aggressive Elf creatures. By utilizing cards like Lead the Stampede and Winding Way to refill your hand with creatures, along with mana acceleration from Llanowar Elves and Arbor Elf, the goal is to flood the board with threats and pump them up with cards like Timberwatch Elf and Nyxborn Hydra. Masked Vandal provides utility for dealing with opponent's threats, while Priest of Titania generates massive amounts of mana to power out your creatures.

This deck focuses on the aggressive use of low-cost creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a continuous stream of damage. By utilizing cheap counterspells and card draw, the deck ensures that it can maintain pressure on the opponent while also disrupting their strategies. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Cryptic Serpent and Murmuring Mystic allows for both quick damage output and the creation of additional threats. Overall, the strategy of this Mono Blue Aggro deck is to control the pace of the game and seize victory through relentless aggression.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly build a board presence and tempo advantage by playing low-cost, efficient creatures and cheap counterspells. The deck aims to control the game through disruption and card advantage, while being able to close out games quickly with evasive threats like Delver of Secrets and Cryptic Serpent. The deck also includes card draw spells like Brainstorm and Thought Scour to help ensure a consistent stream of threats and answers. With a focus on tempo and aggression, this Mono Blue Aggro deck provides a fast-paced and versatile play style.

The main focus of this Pauper 1 vs 1 deck is to quickly and efficiently establish a fog lock to prevent opponents from dealing damage while setting up for a combo win condition. It utilizes a combination of fog effects, mana ramp, and card draw to control the game until it can assemble the necessary pieces for a decisive victory. The deck also includes disruption elements like Duress and Nihil Spellbomb to disrupt opposing strategies and protect its own game plan.
